Name: Central Division
Description: The central region of Fiji, which includes the capital city, Suva, and is the political, economic, and cultural heart of the nation.

Name: Western Division
Description: This region is known for its major tourist destinations, including Nadi and the Mamanuca Islands, with beautiful beaches and resorts.

Name: Northern Division
Description: A tropical region with beautiful islands and less developed infrastructure, it includes the famous islands of Vanua Levu and Taveuni.

Name: Eastern Division
Description: The eastern region of Fiji includes the Lau and Kadavu groups, with a more traditional and rural lifestyle.
